word:
Chap. 50 - The Excellence of Christ

               The Excellence of Christ. Ms 10, 1889 

     I am much surprised that I am as well as I am. I had great fear that my summer's work would enfeeble me for the winter, but to the praise of God I will say he has mercifully lifted me up above my infirmities. I am very much better than for many months, better than last year.
